019package org.jdrupes.vmoperator.common;
020
021import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
022import io.kubernetes.client.Discovery;
023import io.kubernetes.client.Discovery.APIResource;
024import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesListObject;
025import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesObject;
026import io.kubernetes.client.common.KubernetesType;
027import io.kubernetes.client.custom.V1Patch;
028import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiClient;
029import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.ApiException;
030import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.apis.EventsV1Api;
031import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.EventsV1Event;
032import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectMeta;
033import io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ObjectReference;
034import io.kubernetes.client.util.Strings;
035import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.GenericKubernetesApi;
036import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.KubernetesApiResponse;
037import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.dynamic.DynamicKubernetesObject;
038import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.DeleteOptions;
039import io.kubernetes.client.util.generic.options.PatchOptions;
040import java.io.Reader;
041import java.net.HttpURLConnection;
042import java.time.OffsetDateTime;
043import java.util.Map;
044import java.util.Optional;
045import org.yaml.snakeyaml.LoaderOptions;
046import org.yaml.snakeyaml.Yaml;
047import org.yaml.snakeyaml.constructor.SafeConstructor;
048
049/**
050 * Helpers for K8s API.
051 */
052@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ShortClassName", "PMD.UseUtilityClass",
053    "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis" })
054public class K8s {
055
056    /**
057     * Returns the result from an API call as {@link Optional} if the
058     * call was successful. Returns an empty `Optional` if the status
059     * code is 404 (not found). Else throws an exception.
060     *
061     * @param <T> the generic type
062     * @param response the response
063     * @return the optional
064     * @throws ApiException the API exception
065     */
066    public static <T extends KubernetesType> Optional<T>
067            optional(KubernetesApiResponse<T> response) throws ApiException {
068        if (response.isSuccess()) {
069            return Optional.of(response.getObject());
070        }
071        if (response.getHttpStatusCode() == HttpURLConnection.HTTP_NOT_FOUND) {
072            return Optional.empty();
073        }
074        response.throwsApiException();
075        // Never reached
076        return Optional.empty();
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Convert Yaml to Json.
081     *
082     * @param client the client
083     * @param yaml the yaml
084     * @return the json element
085     */
086    public static JsonObject yamlToJson(ApiClient client, Reader yaml) {
087        // Avoid Yaml.load due to
088        // https://github.com/kubernetes-client/java/issues/2741
089        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
090        Map<String, Object> yamlData
091            = new Yaml(new SafeConstructor(new LoaderOptions())).load(yaml);
092
093        // There's no short-cut from Java (collections) to Gson
094        var gson = client.getJSON().getGson();
095        var jsonText = gson.toJson(yamlData);
096        return gson.fromJson(jsonText, JsonObject.class);
097    }
098
099    /**
100     * Lookup the specified API resource. If the version is `null` or
101     * empty, the preferred version in the result is the default
102     * returned from the server.
103     *
104     * @param client the client
105     * @param group the group
106     * @param version the version
107     * @param kind the kind
108     * @return the optional
109     * @throws ApiException the api exception
110     */
111    public static Optional<APIResource> context(ApiClient client,
112            String group, String version, String kind) throws ApiException {
113        var apiMatch = new Discovery(client).findAll().stream()
114            .filter(r -> r.getGroup().equals(group) && r.getKind().equals(kind)
115                && (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(version)
116                    || r.getVersions().contains(version)))
117            .findFirst();
118        if (apiMatch.isEmpty()) {
119            return Optional.empty();
120        }
121        var apiRes = apiMatch.get();
122        if (!Strings.isNullOrEmpty(version)) {
123            if (!apiRes.getVersions().contains(version)) {
124                return Optional.empty();
125            }
126            apiRes = new APIResource(apiRes.getGroup(), apiRes.getVersions(),
127                version, apiRes.getKind(), apiRes.getNamespaced(),
128                apiRes.getResourcePlural(), apiRes.getResourceSingular());
129        }
130        return Optional.of(apiRes);
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * Convenience method for getting the status from a
135     * {@link DynamicKubernetesObject}. 
136     *
137     * @param object the object
138     * @return the JSON object describing the status
139     */
140    public static JsonObject status(K8sDynamicModel state) {
141        return state.data().getAsJsonObject("status");
142    }
143
144    /**
145     * Get an object from its metadata.
146     *
147     * @param <T> the generic type
148     * @param <LT> the generic type
149     * @param api the api
150     * @param meta the meta
151     * @return the object
152     */
153    @Deprecated
154    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
155            Optional<T>
156            get(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, V1ObjectMeta meta) {
157        var response = api.get(meta.getNamespace(), meta.getName());
158        if (response.isSuccess()) {
159            return Optional.of(response.getObject());
160        }
161        return Optional.empty();
162    }
163
164    /**
165     * Delete an object.
166     *
167     * @param <T> the generic type
168     * @param <LT> the generic type
169     * @param api the api
170     * @param object the object
171     */
172    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
173            void delete(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T object)
174                    throws ApiException {
175        api.delete(object.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
176            object.getMetadata().getName()).throwsApiException();
177    }
178
179    /**
180     * Delete an object.
181     *
182     * @param <T> the generic type
183     * @param <LT> the generic type
184     * @param api the api
185     * @param object the object
186     */
187    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
188            void delete(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T object,
189                    DeleteOptions options) throws ApiException {
190        api.delete(object.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
191            object.getMetadata().getName(), options).throwsApiException();
192    }
193
194    /**
195     * Apply the given patch data.
196     *
197     * @param <T> the generic type
198     * @param <LT> the generic type
199     * @param api the api
200     * @param existing the existing
201     * @param update the update
202     * @throws ApiException the api exception
203     */
204    public static <T extends KubernetesObject, LT extends KubernetesListObject>
205            T apply(GenericKubernetesApi<T, LT> api, T existing, String update)
206                    throws ApiException {
207        PatchOptions opts = new PatchOptions();
208        opts.setForce(true);
209        opts.setFieldManager("kubernetes-java-kubectl-apply");
210        var response = api.patch(existing.getMetadata().getNamespace(),
211            existing.getMetadata().getName(), V1Patch.PATCH_FORMAT_APPLY_YAML,
212            new V1Patch(update), opts).throwsApiException();
213        return response.getObject();
214    }
215
216    /**
217     * Create an object reference.
218     *
219     * @param object the object
220     * @return the v 1 object reference
221     */
222    public static V1ObjectReference
223            objectReference(KubernetesObject object) {
224        return new V1ObjectReference().apiVersion(object.getApiVersion())
225            .kind(object.getKind())
226            .namespace(object.getMetadata().getNamespace())
227            .name(object.getMetadata().getName())
228            .resourceVersion(object.getMetadata().getResourceVersion())
229            .uid(object.getMetadata().getUid());
230    }
231
232    /**
233     * Creates an event related to the object, adding reasonable defaults.
234     * 
235     *   * If `kind` is not set, it is set to "Event".
236     *   * If `metadata.namespace` is not set, it is set 
237     *     to the object's namespace.
238     *   * If neither `metadata.name` nor `matadata.generateName` are set,
239     *     set `generateName` to the object's name with a dash appended.
240     *   * If `reportingInstance` is not set, set it to the object's name.
241     *   * If `eventTime` is not set, set it to now.
242     *   * If `type` is not set, set it to "Normal"
243     *   * If `regarding` is not set, set it to the given object.
244     *
245     * @param event the event
246     * @throws ApiException 
247     */
248    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.NPathComplexity")
249    public static void createEvent(ApiClient client,
250            KubernetesObject object, EventsV1Event event)
251            throws ApiException {
252        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getKind())) {
253            event.kind("Event");
254        }
255        if (event.getMetadata() == null) {
256            event.metadata(new V1ObjectMeta());
257        }
258        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getMetadata().getNamespace())) {
259            event.getMetadata().namespace(object.getMetadata().getNamespace());
260        }
261        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getMetadata().getName())
262            && Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getMetadata().getGenerateName())) {
263            event.getMetadata()
264                .generateName(object.getMetadata().getName() + "-");
265        }
266        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getReportingInstance())) {
267            event.reportingInstance(object.getMetadata().getName());
268        }
269        if (event.getEventTime() == null) {
270            event.eventTime(OffsetDateTime.now());
271        }
272        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(event.getType())) {
273            event.type("Normal");
274        }
275        if (event.getRegarding() == null) {
276            event.regarding(objectReference(object));
277        }
278        new EventsV1Api(client).createNamespacedEvent(
279            object.getMetadata().getNamespace(), event, null, null, null, null);
280    }
281}
